Health, Healing, and Hope (H3)

Join me as I catalog my journey of the peaks and valleys of health, healing, and hope (H3 with Laura). I want to share some of my favorite paleo, gluten free, refined sugar-free, and egg free recipes. I hope to share my thoughts on health related topics and provide meaningful tips.

  • Blog

Come Explore Various Facets of my Journey

The journey of health, healing, and hope incorporates lifestyle changes
including focusing on nutrient dense foods, managing stress,
and learning to listen to my body

This is a collection of my personal favorite recipes often passing the test with "non-paleo" eaters.

Desserts

Paleo Recipes

The recipes are focused on nutrient dense foods by removing grains, dairy, refined sugar, and vegetable oils.
